Starting out, you'll be greeted with a large customisation screen, where you'll be able to select your cat's colour, eyes, and various other physical attributes. You'll then have a to choose a clan - this is the group you'll have to live with, fight for, and also defend, so make sure to choose wisely!When the time comes to go to battle, you'll need to monitor your vital signs to stay alive. Work together with clan-mates to achieve set goals and to claim victories over any other competing clans. Upgrade your cat, make new friends, and help your clan climb to the top!

games.name: Weapon Warrior Simulator
games.description:
Do you have what it takes to overcome seemingly interminable waves of approaching adversaries? You can find out about it in the Weapon Warrior Simulator. You must first remove dummies from the training zone with the beginning baton to practice and improve your skills. Enter the first battle zone to begin engaging in combat when prepared for a serious conflict.

games.name: Zombie Defense
games.description:
In the Roblox game Zombie Defense, massive waves of zombies are attacking you and your base. Based on this, you can probably figure out what your mission in the game is. To properly repel zombies, you must first strengthen your defenses. You must do everything in your ability to prevent them from entering the base and destroying everything.

games.name: Zombie Defense Tycoon
games.description:
In Zombie Defense Tycoon, build up your tycoon, collect Goo, and place turrets to fend off endless waves of zombies. Upgrade your weapons, unlock vehicles, and take on other players in this tower defence-based tycoon game. Protect your base from zombies and bosses while becoming the best-equipped fighter against the apocalypse.
